title: Work and business 2
sentences: es muy importante para mi carrera.
This project is very important for my career.
está esperando en la sala de juntas.
The client is waiting in the boardroom.
Can you pass me the budget for the new office?
I have to send this invoice to the accounting department.
It's a big risk to invest all our money now.
We want to invest in modern technology.
tiene precios más bajos que nosotros.
The competition has lower prices than us.

es muy reconocida en toda Europa.
The brand is very recognized throughout Europe.
We have to do more advertising on social media.
Juan is my partner in this new business.
I work in the human resources department.
para este año son muy claros.
Our goals/objectives for this year are very clear.
la estrategia para el próximo mes.
We have to plan the strategy for next month.
tus ideas en la próxima reunión?

I have received an offer that I cannot refuse.
What is the advantage of using this program?
un precio mejor con el proveedor.

trae el material todos los lunes.

We are very satisfied with the results obtained.
dictionary:
El proyecto - The project
